mapper.select: SELECT b.uid, b.name, b.type, b.model, b.version, b.language, b.sort, b.tags, b.category, b.scenes, b.images, b.icon, b.free, b.cost, b.usage_count, b.like_count, b.view_count, b.install_count, b.config, b.description, b.example, b.creator, b.create_time, b.create_time, a.uid AS favoriteUid, a.creator AS favoriteCreator, a.create_time AS favoriteTime FROM llm_app_favorite a LEFT JOIN llm_app_market b ON a.market_uid = b.uid WHERE a.uid = #{uid} AND a.deleted = 0 AND b.deleted = 0 ORDER BY a.create_time DESC LIMIT 1;
